text: It’s not exactly quaffing hurricanes on Bourbon Street, but Chicagoans can now legally carry away cocktails from local bars. Takeaways will be legal for a year,  set to automatically lapse in June 2021. https://t.co/hAPC8s4Tpo

text:
The Justice Department asked a federal judge to halt the publication of John Bolton’s book, saying that it contained classified information even as details emerged from it. 

From The New York Times. https://t.co/Wmw6UiOe2J

text:

He made it. https://t.co/aCzoBWGVqN
